title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: User unable to log in to the account.

title: Payment Failed - Credit Card Declined
description: Payment not processed for recent order.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Invoice PDF not available for last month.

title: Error 404 on Product Page
description: Some product pages show 404 error intermittently.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Requested refund has not been issued yet.

title: Shipping Delay
description: Order delayed beyond expected delivery date.

title: App Crashes on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after opening.

title: Incorrect Billing Amount
description: Customer billed incorrectly for last month.

title: Feature Request - Dark Mode
description: Request to add dark mode option in the app.
